column5: GREEN ACRES is a boutique glamping retreat for all. Whether you are an artist seeking to escape & create, a family looking for quite and intentional time together in nature, or friends wanting time a weekend away in the Texas hill country, Green Acres is your spot. Enjoy our 1965 AIRSTREAM Overlander Land Yacht w/ (1) FULL bed with access to modern Bathhouse & Community Barn w/Kitchen. *Note: 13% hotel occupancy tax is NOT included in price* ** Pop-Up Twin bed available upon request**
